channel.title: Office 365 on Out Of Order Band
channel.description: Recent content in Office 365 on Out Of Order Band

item.title: Office 365, Outlook & attachments
item.description: Recently, we received rather confusing claims from specific users, stating they were receiving certain emails, often days after they had been sent. This behavior was not consistent across the user base. Great – inconsistent errors; don’t you just love them?
